semantic_issues: The Borrow class is not associated with the Book class in a way that reflects the borrowing relationship. It should be linked to both User and Book to represent which User borrowed which Book.
The Borrow class should include a reference to the Book and User to accurately represent the borrowing action.
The diagram does not specify the multiplicity of the relationship between Borrow and Book/User clearly.
recommendations: Add associations from the Borrow class to both User and Book classes to represent the borrowing relationship.
Specify the multiplicity of the Borrow class to indicate that a User can have multiple Borrow instances and a Book can only be associated with one Borrow instance at a time.
Consider renaming the Borrow class to Borrowing for clarity, as it represents the action of borrowing rather than a static entity.
